#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,n,m,b[101];
	int t;
	char a[101][101];
	cin>>t;
	b[0]=-112;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m>>k;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			int count=0;
		for(j=1;j<=m;j++)
		{
			cin>>a[i][j];
			if(a[i][j]=='*')
			count++;
		}
		b[i]=count;
		}
		sort(b,b+n+1);
	  while(k--)
	  {
  	    b[1]=m-b[1];
  	    sort(b,b+n+1);
		  	
  	}
	  int sum=0;	
  	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
  	sum+=b[i];
  	
  	cout<<sum<<"\n";
  	
	}
}
